body.p:
Georgetown Ky May 6th/64
Hon Thos. E. Bramlette
Governor of the Commonwealth of Ky
Dear Sir
From my knowledge of many of the Signers to John Howards petition I am inclinced to look upon it as a meritorious Case, and one which presents an appeal to your executive clemency.

Owen Cir Ct
vs
John Howard
Free M. Color
Tipling $60
6th May/64
